review: This is great for what I use it for, streaming videos from my computer/laptop/tablet/phone.  I have had no issues at all with the laptop, tablet, but I have had some small lag issues or buffering issues from the desktop computer or phone.Other than that its great for the price and does the job, I would recommend this to anyone that likes to travel and watch movies from their tablet or laptops.

review: This device is neat in that it allows you to "cast" your small screen or regular computer videos and such to a TV connected to the Chromecast. I wish there had been more clear information about how it worked, though. Because it doesn't actually stream media from device to TV, it streams from the internet from it's own wireless connection. The app that you install on your device essentially makes your device a remote control for the Chromecast. I don't use it as much as I expected to, but it's still a nice toy to have. I still use my Roku more.

review: We are full time rvers. We thought the chrome cast would be perfect to use going from park to park using with each wifi set up but this is not the case. It has it's limits.  After talking with the google tech we found out if an individual pass word is used for a second portal to wifi, chrome cast can not go through.  We now have a hot spot.  This works great.  The tech with Google had no knowledge hooking to hot spot but said "it might work".  We now have Netflix and it works great..
